parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name to identify the connection by.

parameter.name: serviceUrl
parameter.description: The Pulsar service URL to connect to (e.g., pulsar://localhost:6650).

parameter.name: authentication
parameter.description: Authentication plugin and parameters for Pulsar client.

parameter.name: operationTimeoutSeconds
parameter.description: Timeout for client operations (in seconds).

parameter.name: statsIntervalSeconds
parameter.description: Interval for statistics collection (in seconds).

parameter.name: numIoThreads
parameter.description: Number of IO threads for Pulsar client.

parameter.name: numListenerThreads
parameter.description: Number of listener threads for Pulsar client.

parameter.name: useTcpNoDelay
parameter.description: Enable TCP no delay for network connections.

parameter.name: requestTimeoutMs
parameter.description: Timeout for requests (in milliseconds).

parameter.name: maxConcurrentLookupRequests
parameter.description: Maximum number of concurrent lookup requests allowed on each broker connection.

parameter.name: maxRejectedRequestsPerConnection
parameter.description: Maximum number of rejected requests per connection.

parameter.name: keepAliveIntervalSeconds
parameter.description: Keep-alive interval for broker connections (in seconds).

parameter.name: maxBackoffInterval
parameter.description: Maximum backoff interval for reconnection attempts (in milliseconds).

parameter.name: concurrentLookupRequest
parameter.description: Number of concurrent lookup requests allowed.

parameter.name: connectionMaxIdleSeconds
parameter.description: Maximum idle time for connections (in seconds).

parameter.name: connectionTimeoutMs
parameter.description: Timeout for establishing a connection (in milliseconds).

parameter.name: connectionsPerBroker
parameter.description: Number of connections per broker.

parameter.name: dnsLookupBindAddress
parameter.description: Bind address for DNS lookup.

parameter.name: dnsLookupBindPort
parameter.description: Bind port for DNS lookup.

parameter.name: dnsServerAddresses
parameter.description: DNS server addresses to use for lookups.

parameter.name: enableBusyWait
parameter.description: Enable busy-wait for IO threads.

parameter.name: enableTransaction
parameter.description: Enable transaction support in Pulsar client.

parameter.name: initialBackoffInterval
parameter.description: Initial backoff interval for reconnection attempts (in milliseconds).

parameter.name: listenerName
parameter.description: Listener name for the Pulsar client.

parameter.name: lookupTimeoutMs
parameter.description: Timeout for lookup requests (in milliseconds).

parameter.name: maxLookupRedirects
parameter.description: Maximum number of lookup redirects allowed.

parameter.name: maxLookupRequest
parameter.description: Maximum number of lookup requests allowed on each broker connection to prevent overloading a broker.

parameter.name: maxNumberOfRejectedRequestPerConnection
parameter.description: Maximum number of rejected requests per connection.

parameter.name: memoryLimitBytes
parameter.description: Memory limit for Pulsar client (in bytes).

parameter.name: tlsTrustCertsFilePath
parameter.description: Path to the TLS trust certificates file.

parameter.name: tlsAllowInsecureConnection
parameter.description: Allow insecure TLS connections.

parameter.name: enableTlsHostnameVerification
parameter.description: Enable hostname verification for TLS connections.

parameter.name: useKeyStoreTls
parameter.description: Enable TLS using keystore.

parameter.name: tlsTrustStoreType
parameter.description: Type of the TLS trust store.

parameter.name: tlsTrustStorePath
parameter.description: Path to the TLS trust store.

parameter.name: tlsTrustStorePassword
parameter.description: Password for the TLS trust store.

parameter.name: tlsCiphers
parameter.description: List of enabled TLS ciphers.

parameter.name: tlsProtocols
parameter.description: List of enabled TLS protocols.

parameter.name: useTLS
parameter.description: Enable TLS for Pulsar client connection.

parameter.name: tlsCertificateFilePath
parameter.description: Path to the TLS certificate file.

parameter.name: tlsKeyFilePath
parameter.description: Path to the TLS key file.

parameter.name: tlsKeyStoreType
parameter.description: Type of the TLS key store.

parameter.name: tlsKeyStorePath
parameter.description: Path to the TLS key store.

parameter.name: tlsKeyStorePassword
parameter.description: Password for the TLS key store.

parameter.name: authenticationType
parameter.description: Type of authentication (e.g., JWT, TLS, OAUTH2, NONE).

parameter.name: authParamMap
parameter.description: Map of authentication parameters.

parameter.name: authParams
parameter.description: Authentication parameters string.

parameter.name: authPluginClassName
parameter.description: Class name of the authentication plugin.

parameter.name: jwtToken
parameter.description: JWT token for Pulsar client.
